name: DES BLOOD 2
summary:
The heroine of the game awakens in a cryo chamber. She doesn't remember anything. She doesn't know who she is, where she is, or what year it is now. She finds a medallion with the name "Lily" engraved on it, and a date: 2156 AD. As she begins to search for answers, trying to get her memory back, the heroine realizes she must also face the Space Army - an intergalactic organization controlled by the computer Isys. The Space Army is looking for something that apparently only our heroine can give them - and the cost would be her life...

Des Blood 2 is set in the same universe and time period as its predecessor. Unlike the first game, it has third-person exploration mode along with the shooting mode. The shooting parts are quite similar to those of the first game. You aim and shoot at enemies from a fixed first-person perspective; enemies appear at pre-set locations. The sex scenes have enhanced interaction. You are able to choose objects and interact separately with the girl's body parts.
